sect1.title: Adjusting the toolchain
sect1.para: Run the following command from within the binutils-build directory:

screen.userinput: SPECFILE=`gcc --print-file specs` && sed 's@ /lib/ld-linux.so.2@ /tools/lib/ld-linux.so.2@g' \ $SPECFILE > tempspecfile && mv -f tempspecfile $SPECFILE && unset SPECFILE
echo 'main(){}' > dummy.c cc dummy.c readelf -l a.out | grep ': /tools'
